TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlAuthenticationStatement extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement

summary.span: 表示 安全性權杖的宣告，這個宣告會判斷該主體會在特定時間以特定方式通過驗證。

span.span: Represents a claim for a security token that asserts that the subject was authenticated by a particular means at a particular time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全性權杖會使用 SAML 判斷提示 (Assertion) 來指定其宣告，而這種判斷指示可指定何時驗證此主體。 security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify when the subject was authenticated. SAML 判斷提示中的宣告會以 SAML 陳述式表示。The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements. SAML 規格會定義一組 SAML 陳述式型別，而其中一個為 。The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a . 可判斷該陳述式主體會在特定時間以特定方式通過驗證。A asserts that the statement's subject was authenticated by a particular means at a particular time.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 使用指定的驗證詳細資料，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified authentication details.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證方法的集合具有擴充性；但是下表包含的是已定義於 SAML 規格中的驗證方法集合。The set of authentication methods is extensible; however the following table contains the set of authentication methods defined in the SAML specification. |驗證方法Authentication method|URIURI| |---------------------------|---------| |密碼Password|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:passwordurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:password| |KerberosKerberos|urn:ietf:rfc:1510urn:ietf:rfc:1510| |安全遠端密碼 (SRP)Secure Remote Password (SRP)|urn:ietf:rfc:2945urn:ietf:rfc:2945| |硬體權杖Hardware Token|URI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareTokenURI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareToken| |以 SSL/TLS 憑證為基礎的用戶端驗證SSL/TLS Certificate Based Client Authentication|urn:ietf:rfc:2246urn:ietf:rfc:2246| |PGP 公開金鑰PGP Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGPurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGP| |SPKI 公開金鑰SPKI Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKIurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKI| |XKMS 公開金鑰XKMS Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:XKMSurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:XKMS| |XML 數位簽章XML Digital Signature|urn:ietf:rfc:3075urn:ietf:rfc:3075| |未指定Unspecified|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecifiedurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified| 當 `authenticationMethod` 參數是 `null` 時，驗證方法會設定為 `urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified`。When the `authenticationMethod` parameter is `null`, the authentication method is set to `urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified`.

The method used to authenticate the subject.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證方法的集合具有擴充性；但是下表包含的是已定義於 SAML 規格中的驗證方法集合。The set of authentication methods is extensible; however the following table contains the set of authentication methods defined in the SAML specification. |驗證方法Authentication method|URIURI| |---------------------------|---------| |密碼Password|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:passwordurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:password| |KerberosKerberos|urn:ietf:rfc:1510urn:ietf:rfc:1510| |安全遠端密碼 (SRP)Secure Remote Password (SRP)|urn:ietf:rfc:2945urn:ietf:rfc:2945| |硬體權杖Hardware Token|URI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareTokenURI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareToken| |以 SSL/TLS 憑證為基礎的用戶端驗證SSL/TLS Certificate Based Client Authentication|urn:ietf:rfc:2246urn:ietf:rfc:2246| |PGP 公開金鑰PGP Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGPurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGP| |SPKI 公開金鑰SPKI Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKIurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKI| |XKMS 公開金鑰XKMS Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:XKMSurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:XKMS| |XML 數位簽章XML Digital Signature|urn:ietf:rfc:3075urn:ietf:rfc:3075| |未指定Unspecified|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecifiedurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified| 當 屬性設定為 `null` 時，驗證方法會設定為 `urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified`。When the property is set to `null`, the authentication method is set to `urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified`. 屬性 (Property) 會對應到已在 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) 規格中定義之 `AuthenticationMethod` 項目的 `` 屬性 (Attribute)。The property corresponds to the `AuthenticationMethod` attribute of the `` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
